name: react-textarea-autosize
description: textarea component for React which grows with content
author: Andrey Popp <8mayday@gmail.com> (https://andreypopp.com/)

scripts.build: npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:es: rimraf es && cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es --sourceMaps=inline
scripts.build:cjs: rimraf lib && cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir lib --sourceMaps=inline
scripts.build:umd: rimraf dist && npm run build:umd:prod && npm run build:umd:dev
scripts.build:umd:prod: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=production rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/react-textarea-autosize.min.js
scripts.build:umd:dev: cross-env BABEL_ENV=es NODE_ENV=development rollup -c -i src/index.js -o dist/react-textarea-autosize.js
scripts.clean: rimraf es && rimraf lib && rimraf dist
scripts.prerelease: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.release:patch: npm run prerelease && npm version patch && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run prerelease && npm version minor && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
scripts.release:major: npm run prerelease && npm version major && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
